title: The Borders: where Scotland and England meet
creator_credit: Mike Pavett, Robin Crichton and Edinburgh Film Productions
brief_description: Examines the agricultural and industrial development of the border regions of Scotland and England, and the growth of new houses and educational institutions. Highlights projects which have been implemented to attract population and encourage young people to stay instead of seeking careers and employment elsewhere.
